Summarize and Visualize Analysis Pipeline Steps

run_pipeline_summary.Rd

This function prints and visualizes the analysis steps stored in the metadata of a MultiAssayExperiment object. The steps are optionally printed to the console as a numbered list and always rendered as a left-to-right Mermaid flowchart. The flowchart wraps to a new row after every 5 steps.

Usage

run_pipeline_summary(
  expomicset,
  show_index = TRUE,
  console_print = FALSE,
  include_notes = FALSE
)

Arguments

expomicset

A MultiAssayExperiment object that contains a "steps" entry in its metadata.

show_index

Logical, default TRUE. Prefix steps with index.

console_print

Logical, default FALSE. If TRUE, prints to console.

include_notes

Logical, default FALSE. If TRUE, appends notes from each step.

Value

No return value; called for side effects (console print + diagram).
